courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of programming with this introductory course.

modules.title: Basic Syntax
modules.content: Introduction to variables, data types, and operators.

modules.title: Control Flow
modules.content: Understanding conditionals and loops.

courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of developing a good-looking, modern webpage.

modules.title: HTML Basics
modules.content: Introduction to HTML structure and elements.

modules.title: CSS Styling
modules.content: Learn the basics of styling webpages with CSS.

courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of JavaScript programming language.

modules.title: JavaScript Syntax
modules.content: Basic syntax of JavaScript, including functions and variables.

modules.title: DOM Manipulation
modules.content: Interacting with the DOM using JavaScript.

courses.description: Deep dive into JavaScript concepts such as closures, promises, and async/await.

modules.title: Closures and Scope
modules.content: Understanding closures, lexical scope, and hoisting.

modules.title: Asynchronous JavaScript
modules.content: Promises, async/await, and event loop.

courses.description: Learn fundamental data structures and algorithms.

modules.title: Arrays and Linked Lists
modules.content: Understanding arrays, linked lists, and their operations.

modules.title: Sorting Algorithms
modules.content: QuickSort, MergeSort, and BubbleSort explained.

courses.description: Learn the basics of React.js for modern frontend development.

modules.title: JSX and Components
modules.content: Understanding JSX syntax and React components.

modules.title: State and Props
modules.content: Managing component state and props in React.

courses.description: Learn how to build backend applications using Node.js.

modules.title: Node.js Basics
modules.content: Introduction to Node.js and package management.

modules.title: Building an API
modules.content: Creating a RESTful API using Express.js.

courses.description: Learn C++ programming language from the ground up.

modules.title: C++ Syntax
modules.content: Understanding C++ syntax and data types.

modules.title: OOP in C++
modules.content: Introduction to object-oriented programming in C++.

courses.description: Learn about artificial intelligence and neural networks.

modules.title: Introduction to AI
modules.content: Overview of artificial intelligence and its applications.

modules.title: Neural Networks
modules.content: Basics of deep learning and neural networks.

courses.description: Learn how to develop web applications using Django.

modules.title: Django Basics
modules.content: Setting up a Django project and creating models.

modules.title: Templates and Views
modules.content: Using Django templates and views to build dynamic web pages.
